text:
Happy Birthday to my favourite raindrop !!!!!
You're one of the sweetest people I know.
Hope you have a day with lots of rest and joy like you deserve. Love you lots!

It's that time again.
Congrats on making it this far!

Happy Birthday Rainyy!
Wishing you the best with many cozy rainy days ahead!

happy birthday Rainy, Iâ€™m really hoping youâ€™re having a great one and that youâ€™re getting lots of rests and good foods!!
Thank you for being there for me and being an awesome friend!!

happeh borth rainy! You have come to see a new day!
Even though you do not love foxes at all I still cherish you as a fren!
We need to kidnap Kosen together to torture him- Weissu

Happy Birthday Rainyyyyyyy!
Wishing the most awesome and bestest for you!
With another year comes another page in your story, and may it bring lots of great things and fun surprises!

Happy Birthday Bestieeee, keep being awesome and keep up that amazing smile!!
Remember always treat yourself nice and being an awesome tomodachi!!

Hi Rainy!!! My favorite raindrop that I totally did not murder and is spreading lies about thisâ€” 

I wish you have an amazing day!! I love you so much and I cant believe we've been friends for this long! I want to let you know how proud I am of you. You've grown so much from the person I met and I can see that youre continuing to grow even more. 

I know things are weird and scary and uncertain sometimes and things can be disheartening, but I want you to know that I see all the effort you put in and while things have been hectic as of the moment schedule wise, please know that I'm always rooting for you! 

I lab u~ YA NEEEEEEEERD~

RAINYYYYY, OUR DEAR (definetly not wo'ah cannibal) DROP OF JOY, happy birfdayyyyy.
Hope you're having a great one with lots of gifts, food and rest~. -Kuwa

HAPPY BIRTHDAY RAINYYYYYY !!!

I wish you all the best for your special day.
You deserve a year filled with peace, laughter and all the good things you could imagine.

A lot has happened lately, and I know lifeâ€™s been hectic for you. But remember, Iâ€™m always here for you, ready to bring you joy, lighten your load, and cheer you on at any time.

Thank you for being here and being you.
You're maybe the most awesome rain drop, but also the sunshine everyone needs in their lives.
Have a great day and enjoy it to the fullest.
